content.title: Intro
content.content:
1958
Preceded by
1958
1959
Year
1960
Followed by
1960

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1959.

content.title: January
content.content:
10 - Screenwriter Fran Walsh is born.
12 - Simon Tolkien is born.

content.title: February
content.content:
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 214a.
5 - Peter Emshwiller, who would provide the voice of Thranduil in The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II, is born.

content.title: March
content.content:
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 214b.
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to William Ready.
20 - Game designer Anders Blixt is born.

content.title: April
content.content:
17 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 215.
17 - Sean Bean, who would play Boromir in The Lord of the Rings (film series), is born.

content.title: May
content.content:
26 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss Robinson.
30 - Swedish-French director Charlotte Brändström is born.

content.title: June
content.content: 5 - J.R.R. Tolkien delivers the Valedictory Address to the University of Oxford.

content.title: July
content.content: 16 - Bob Joles, who would voice Gimli, Treebeard and Dáin Ironfoot in various EA video games, is born.

content.title: August
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien serves the first Mass of Robert Murray.
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 215a.
12 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 216.

content.title: September
content.content:
10 - Actor Jim Meskimen is born.
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 217.

content.title: October
content.content:
9 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 218.
15 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 220.
16 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 219.

content.title: November
content.content:
2 - Actor Peter Mullan is born.
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 220a.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 221.
?' - The poem "The Passing of the Elven-kind" by Ted Johnstone, the oldest known published Tolkien fan faction, is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
9 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222.
29 - Brian Sergent, who would play Ted Sandyman in the extended edition of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, is born.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski.

? - J.R.R. Tolkien retires from the Merton professorship at the University of Oxford.
? - Author Douglas A. Anderson is born.
? - Science fiction scholar Michael Martinez is born.
? - Actor Harry Sinclair is born.
Years
1956 1957 1958 1959 1960 1961 1962
